== Event set header ==
|| *Offset* || *Length* || *Name* ||
||0||2|| Number of active event blocks ||
||2||2|| Number of event blocks ||

== Active event blocks ==
 * 2 bytes per active event block
 * for the # of active event blocks:
|| *Offset* || *Length* || *Name* ||
||0||2|| Block number ||

== Event blocks ==
 * 12 bytes per event block
 * for the # of event blocks:
|| *Offset* || *Length* || *Name* ||
||0||1|| event type ||
||1||1|| byte 1 ||
||2||1|| byte 2 ||
||3||1|| byte 3 ||
||4||1|| byte 4 ||
||5||1|| byte 5 ||
||6||2|| word 6 ||
||8||2|| word 8 ||
||10||2|| next event ||
